ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula L f v t)" on hypothesis of type "SysPrf T (substituteFormula L f v t)".

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language H0 : forall (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) T : fol.System L f : fol.Formula L v : nat t : fol.Term L x : fol.Formulas L x0 : folProof.Prf L x (substituteFormula L f v t) H : forall g : fol.Formula L, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula L) T g Unable to unify "T ?M3404" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : folProof.Prf L Axm (fol.existH L v f)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) T g".

original: intros T f v t H. apply forallE with (v:=v) (t:=t) in H. apply H.
